mapper.update: update tb_project_info set status = #{newStatus} where id = #{id}
update tb_project_info set reason = #{reason} where id=#{id}
update tb_project_info set remaining_funds = #{remainingFunds} where id = #{projectId}
update tb_project_info set deadline = #{newDeadline} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_project_info where status=3 and applicant_id = #{id}
select count(*) from tb_project_info where status=4 and applicant_id = #{id}

select p.project_name as projectName, u.name as approver, pl.reason, pl.create_time as createTime, p.status as status from tb_project_info p inner join tb_project_log pl on p.id = pl.project_id left join tb_user_info u on pl.approver_id = u.id where p.status in (0, 1) and p.applicant_id = #{id} order by pl.create_time desc

select id,project_name as projectName,project_type as projectType,applicant,applicant_id as applicantId,funds,remaining_funds as remainingFunds, content,start_time as startTime,deadline,update_time as updateTime, status,reason from tb_project_info where status = 0

select id,project_name as projectName,project_type as projectType,applicant,applicant_id as applicantId,funds,remaining_funds as remainingFunds, content,start_time as startTime,deadline,update_time as updateTime, status,reason from tb_project_info where status in (2,3,4,5) order by startTime desc
select status from tb_project_info where id = #{id}
select count(*) from tb_project_info where status = #{status}
select count(*) from tb_project_info where status in (0,1)
select count(*) from tb_project_info where status in (2,3,4,5)
select id from tb_project_info where applicant_id = #{id}
